title: How the News Brainwashes Us
itunes:title: How the News Brainwashes Us
description:
Want to know why the news is so negative? It's very simple... because they understand human psychology! In this episode, I am going to talk about why the news is so negative, why you should never watch it and what you should do instead.

Follow me on Instagram @RobDialJr https://www.instagram.com/robdialjr/
